Posts.Content: Hi - I am just about to start weekly IV  taxol - 3 weeks on 1 off for secondary BC.  My Oncologist said with the use of the cold cap 80% of people kept their hair.  Has anyone had any success with the cold cap on this regime?
Posts.Title: Weekly Paclitaxel - hair loss

Posts.Content: Hi Leesuilee, thanks for your reply and sorry it has taken me so long to reply but I have felt shite - unusually for me feeling very down and negative.   I'm glad your hair grew back after 6 months - did this coincide with you actually coming off the treatment ?  I'm staying on IV chemo.  until it stops working or until I become too toxic to take anymore ..... shite, shite but what can we do.  xxxx
Posts.Title: Weekly Paclitaxel - hair loss

Posts.Content: Hi Spenfold, thanks for your reply, sorry it has taken me so long to reply, I've just not been in a very good place but am back at work and feeling more positive.  I did loose my hair first time round so am so hoping to keep it this time on a lower dose of Taxol - I know in the grand scheme of things losing hair is a minor thing, but to me it makes a very private fight all of a sudden public.  I will defo. look at getting a wig if I loose too much hair, but as my head is the size of a pin - nickname in the past has been PINHEAD - hope I can get one that fits the size of a 6 year old - which actually coincides with the size of my brain - ha ha .  Good luck and thanks so much xxx
